DataElement.preferredName: Dental Implant Dental Restoration Crown Replacement Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date related to replacement of dental prosthesis placed permanently in tissue for replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure or portion of the tooth covered by enamel.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental Implant Dental Restoration Crown Replacement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to replacement of dental prosthesis placed permanently in tissue for replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure or portion of the tooth covered by enamel.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Materials placed into (endosseous) or onto (subperiosteal) the jawbone; commonly used to support a crown, bridge, artificial tooth, stabilize a diseased tooth, or to use as anchorage in orthodontic therapy.

Concepts.definition: Materials placed into (endosseous) or onto (subperiosteal) the jawbone; commonly used to support a crown, bridge, artificial tooth, stabilize a diseased tooth, or to use as anchorage in orthodontic therapy.

Property.preferredDefinition: Replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.:The portion of the tooth covered by enamel.:The act of removing one thing and putting another thing in its place.

Concepts.definition: Replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.
The portion of the tooth covered by enamel.
The act of removing one thing and putting another thing in its place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
